body_html:
@samikama I've just tried the most recent master branch. Seems there is error during the conversion.

body:
@samikama I've just tried the most recent master branch. Seems there is error during the conversion.

> 2018-06-26 15:20:51.327926: I tensorflow/core/grappler/devices.cc:51] Number of eligible GPUs (core count >= 8): 1
